items.title: Kash Patel faces questions on Charlie Kirk investigation in congressional hearings
items.description: FBI Director Kash Patel to begin two days of questioning on Tuesday from congressional committees about his tenure leading the FBI.

items.title: WATCH:  At least 1 killed in Russian aerial attack on Ukraine
